headline: Is Now the Right Time to Reassess 3M After Its Recent 7.7% Rally?
summary: If you are sizing up what to do with 3M stock right now, you are not alone. Lately, the price has seen some action that might have you questioning whether this household name is quietly offering new opportunities or just keeping pace with the market. After a strong run earlier in the year, climbing 19.9% year-to-date and 17.8% over the past 12 months, 3M still shows some confidence from investors. Over the last month, shares have jumped 7.7% despite a mild 2.0% dip this past week. This is...
